channel.title: Desperate phisher
channel.description:
Hello! I just want to share a little story with you. So today i came across an interesting mail i got , It looks like it was sent from Jagex ( But it's not ) about my account that it was being sold or something.. I was like wtf , when was the last time i played? I wanted to see what it's all about and clicked the link which was a bit suspicious , and google chrome warned me about it , so i knew it was an attempt to phish me.
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/ggf_zpsf4267276.png[/img]
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/gaaa_zps567e60ef.png[/img]
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/gfsdg_zps5eb65e58.png[/img]
Tried to put in fake name and password just because.
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/afgafafg_zpsdacd3b0b.png[/img]
And the result:
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/gggggggggggggggg_zps58110349.png[/img]
Which after you clicked submit it redirects you to the original runescape website. I have to say i was impressed by how somebody did it. But a$$holes are a$$holes.

@naseem142 wrote:

I was being sarcastic …
Lock request , i don’t know why i posted this in the first place

oh you guys didn’t know about that guys former lifestyle that he denies still?

and…

Jmood:

Nothing new I get emails all the time.

item.title: Desperate phisher
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:6, topic:538849”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=657683.msg4399506#msg4399506 date=1390230599]

Have you been under a rock the past 6 years or something

Yeah , it was a bit too dark but I got everything under control. The worst part was worms infesting my whole bed. Tough 6 years…
[/quote]
Can’t tell if troll or srs…[/quote]

Are you a special kind of stupid?

Read full topic
